derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: French, from Old French marmite 'hypocritical', with reference to the hidden contents of the lidded pot, from marmotter 'to mutter' + mite 'cat'

means.word_mean: 1. soup cooked in a large pot
2. a large pot especially one with legs used e.g. for cooking soup
